sentences.english: Can we buy it on instalment?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以用分期付款的方式买吗？

sentences.english: She bought a set of furniture on easy terms.
sentences.chinese: 她以分期付款的方式买了一套家具。

sentences.english: I bought the house by instalment.
sentences.chinese: 我用分期付款购买房子。

sentences.english: In view of the large amount involve in this transaction, we hope you'll agree to our request for installment payment.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于这笔交易数额较大，希望贵方能同意分期付款。

sentences.english: He's bought a car by installment.
sentences.chinese: 他用分期付款的方式买了一台汽车。

sentences.english: He bought a villa on easy terms.
sentences.chinese: 他用分期付款的方式买了一栎别墅。

sentences.english: A widely used promotion method by local retailers is therefore to provide interest-free payment by installment.
sentences.chinese: 当地商家促销手段通常是分期付款，不收利息。

sentences.english: She couldn't meet the payments,so they repossessed the car.
sentences.chinese: 她付不出分期付款，所以他们把汽车收回去了。

sentences.english: There is a mandatory ten percent down payment on all layaway items.
sentences.chinese: 所有分期付款的品项一律要付百分之十头期款。

sentences.english: Millionaires don't buy things on instalments!
sentences.chinese: 百万富翁是不会分期付款来买东西的。

sentences.english: You can buy these television - sets on hire purchase.
sentences.chinese: 买这些电视机可以分期付款。

sentences.english: We prefer to make payment for these machines by instalments.
sentences.chinese: 我方希望用分期付款方式购买这些机器。

sentences.english: I have bought this house on instalments.
sentences.chinese: 我用分期付款的方式买了这所房子。

sentences.english: The total value of the entire equipment will be reimbursed to you by installment in4 years.
sentences.chinese: 全部设备为部款项将采用四年期分期付款的办法偿付。

sentences.english: We' re buying a TV on hire-purchase.
sentences.chinese: 我们以分期付款方式购买一台电视机。

sentences.english: We bought this house on the never-never.
sentences.chinese: 我们以分期付款的方式买下这座房子。
